trial_identification.studytitle: Study Evaluating Safety & Immunogenicity of rLP2086 Vaccine in Healthy Toddlers
trial_identification.scientifictitle: A Randomized, Observer-Blinded, Parallel-Group, Active-Control, Phase 1/2 Trial of the Safety, Immunogenicity, and Tolerability of 20 µg, 60 µg, and 200 µg of Meningococcal Group B rLP2086 Vaccine in Healthy Adolescents Aged 10 to 12 Years

interventions.interventions:
Other interventions - MnB vaccine rLP8026 Other interventions - MnB vaccine rLP8026 Other interventions - MnB vaccine rLP8026
Experimental: Cohort 1 - Experimental (20ug); Active Comparator/Placebo
Experimental: Cohort 2 - Experimental (60ug); Active Comparator/Placebo
Experimental: Cohort 3 - Experimental (200ug); Active Comparator/Placebo
Other interventions: MnB vaccine rLP8026 MnB vaccine at 20ug dose (0,1,6 months) or control (Hepatitis A vaccine, placebo, Hepatitis A vaccine at 0,1,6 months, respectively)
Other interventions: MnB vaccine rLP8026 MnB vaccine at 60ug dose (0,1,6 months) or control (Hepatitis A vaccine, placebo, Hepatitis A vaccine at 0,1,6 months, respectively)
Other interventions: MnB vaccine rLP8026 MnB vaccine at 200ug dose (0,1,6 months) or control (Hepatitis A vaccine, placebo, Hepatitis A vaccine at 0,1,6 months, respectively)

primaryOutcome.outcome: Local and systemic reactions through 14 days post-injection; Vaccinations at 0,1,6 months

eligibility.inclusivecriteria:
Inclusion Criteria
- Aged 18- to 36-months
- Healthy male or female subjects
eligibility.exclusivecriteria:
Exclusion Criteria
- Prior vaccination with a serogroup B meningococcal vaccine
- Prior history of any invasive meningococcal disease

sponsorship.primarysponsorname: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer

ethicsAndSummary.summary: A study to assess the safety of an investigational meningitis vaccine in toddlers and their immune response to it.

contact.name: Medical Monitor
contact.address: Wyeth is now a wholly owned subsidiary of Pfizer
